metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27919 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: archive/zip in Go 1.16.x before 1.16.1 allows attackers to cause a denialof service (panic) upon attempted use of the Reader.Open API for a ZIParchive in which ../ occurs at the beginning of any filename.

criterions.comment: golang-1.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
